entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then periods of light snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 in Forillon Park in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023
